overview.author: Darby Van Uitert
overview.summary: Graph anisotropy metric in barycentric coords. The metrics all vary from 0.0 to 1.0, and will be sampled in the lower right half of the image. The plane on which they are sampled is a surface of constant trace.

description.p: Graph anisotropy metric in barycentric coords. The metrics all vary from 0.0 to 1.0, and will be sampled in the lower right half of the image. The plane on which they are sampled is a surface of constant trace.
Resolution : resolution of anisotropy plot. This value should be an integer.
Sample Whole Triangle of Constant Trace : check to sample the whole triangle of constant trace, instead of just the sixth of it in which the eigenvalues have the traditional sorted order.
Set Outside Pixel Values to NaN : set the pixel values outside the triangle to be NaN. If not checked they will be set to 0.
